articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Surprising Study Finds Potatoes Evolved From Tomato Ancestor - ScienceAlert
articles.description: You say potato, I say tomato? Turns out one helped create the other: Natural interbreeding between wild tomatoes and potato-like plants in South America gave rise to the modern day spud around nine million years ago, according to a new study published Thursda…
articles.content:
You say potato, I say tomato?
